name: Behind own Frontlines
description:
"Behind own Frontlines" is the game in The Great Patriotic War setting where the player takes role of NKVD operator who is given a task to discover a saboteur group in the forest behind Red Army frontlines.

Gameplay consists of exploring the forest, fighting with different enemy groups inside, completing quests for local villagers and Red Army, gearing up in the process. In the end player will face an elite saboteur group which player will have to overcome.

The game is made with Unreal Engine 5.

The game is in active development, so it is not fully polished and contain bugs, being mostly the playable alpha version tested only for critical functionality.

Though I'll be happy if anyone give it a try - it has plenty of content already. The feedback will help me to improve the game experience.
